page.title: 07Blennerhasset Cricket Club.
page.content: I joined Blennerhasset Cricket Club on the 13th June .Blennerhasset is about three miles away from Fletchertown. These are some of the players who play for Blennerhasset Cricket Club.Mark Rawel,Mark Williams,(Captain) Martin Turner,Martin Batty,(Vice Captain)and Stuart Wilson.We bat on a 22 yard pitch that's where we've got to bowl and the whole cricket pitch is about 800 yards in diameter. We travel by car,to matches away from the village,and we have to take 50p with us to pay for the petrol.We play twenty overs and we have four bowlers they are,Martin Batty,Richard Hunter,Craig Donald,Mark Rawel.An over is six bowls of the ball. These are some of the places we have been to play, Cockermouth, Keswick and we played Workington at home.It is necessary to wear white when bowling.
